title: Anger in Uganda over plans for tax on social media
text:
Anger in Uganda over plans for tax on social media 3:02pm BST - 01:39
Uganda's government plans to introduce a tax for using social media sites in the near future but as Francis Maguire reports that's drawn criticism from human rights campaigners and businesses. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Uganda's government plans to introduce a tax for using social media sites in the near future but as Francis Maguire reports that's drawn criticism from human rights campaigners and businesses.
